sentences.en: A plane curve everywhere equidistant from a given fixed point, the center.
sentences.cn: 从定点(圆心)等距离到任一点的平面曲线.

sentences.en: After developing the emulsion it was found to blackened along a series of equidistant parallel bands.
sentences.cn: 乳胶显影后,发现它是在一组等间距的平行带上变黑.

sentences.en: All planes in one family are equidistant from one another.
sentences.cn: 每一族的所有平面彼此距离相等.

sentences.en: All points on a circle are equidistant from the centre.
sentences.cn: 圆周上各点离圆心的距离相等。

sentences.en: Altus is equidistant from Ozark and Cotton Town.
sentences.cn: 从阿尔特斯到奥沙克和到棉花镇的距离是相等的。

sentences.en: D . Move finger or object equidistant from you and client outside of own field of vision.
sentences.cn: 在检查者与受检者等距离处移动手指或物体至自身视野外.

sentences.en: For the fundamentals , B'- B " is very small and therefore the lines are almost equidistant.
sentences.cn: 对于基频振动来说, B ′-B″ 很小,因此谱线是几乎等距离的.

sentences.en: Horsey is equidistant from Great Yarmouth and Mundesley.
sentences.cn: 从霍西到大雅茅斯和曼斯利的距离相等。

sentences.en: Lampholders plane circular ring by equidistant cloth tiger for the two - body pack.
sentences.cn: 灯座平面圆形,下由等距环布的双身虎承驮.

sentences.en: Our house is equidistant from the two pubs in the village.
sentences.cn: 我们的房子离村中两家酒馆距离相等.

sentences.en: Q - transform of distance distribution of binary equidistant codes and equidistant constant weight codes were studied.
sentences.cn: 研究了二元等距码、等重等距码及其距离分布的Q - 变换.

sentences.en: Taking equidistant 3 - profile hole as an example, the method of designing and grinding tool is intro - duced.
sentences.cn: 本文讨论了用展成法加工非圆孔的原理,以加工等厚形三面孔为例, 介绍了插刀设计与刃磨方法.

sentences.en: The cables are parallel and equidistant from each other.
sentences.cn: 钢索彼此平行而间距相等.

sentences.en: The correct processing of narrow groove which is not equidistant always has a difficult problem.
sentences.cn: 不等距的窄槽找正加工是机械加工的难题之一.

sentences.en: The two parks are about equidistant from the station.
sentences.cn: 这两个公园离火车站的距离差不多相同.

sentences.en: Using improved BP neural network, equidistant surface reconstruction of NURBS is proposed.
sentences.cn: 利用改进的BP神经网络构造三次有理B样 条曲面等距面.

trans.tran_en: at an equal distance from two places
